Message:
Witch power...
Just the mention of it
brought back memories of
that night.

That dark night,
when hungry creatures
attacked us...

A mysterious power
surged out of me, and I...
I hurt Big Sis...!

...I know I can’t stay
this way forever.
I wanna be strong,
just like Big Sis.

Every day I spend with Big Sis
only makes me love her more.
But at the same time,
I get more scared
to use my power...!

What if I lose control and
hurt Big Sis again...or Master...?

Big Sis wrapped
her warm hands around
my trembling fingers.

Ah...Big Sis’s hands.
They’ve never failed
to protect me.
Because she’s the kindest big sis
in the whole wide world...
